translation.en: How the hell did you unlock my car?
Same amount when you get the job done.
translation.es: Te daré lo mismo cuando termines el trabajo.

translation.en: Still want me to do it at the wedding?
Yeah.
You know you are really crazy?
Can you just get the job done?
There is only one pharmaceutical company in this country that has the experience,
translation.es: Solo una empresa farmacéutica en este país tiene la experiencia,

translation.en: the size…
the reach,
and the expertise
to succeed with such an undertaking.
translation.es: para tener éxito con semejante proyecto.

translation.en: That company… is Ademola Pharmaceuticals.
And we look forward to your decision over the next few days.
translation.es: Esperamos su decisión durante los próximos días.

translation.en: And if you have any more questions,
our technical team will be more than happy to answer them.
translation.es: nuestro equipo técnico estará encantado de responderlas.

translation.en: Now, if you will excuse me,
I really don't want to be late for my own wedding.
translation.es: no quiero llegar tarde a mi boda.

translation.en: Kemi.
It's the same as yours.
I had it made specially for you.
Oh, it's so beautiful.
- I know. - Thank you.
Oh. No.
Thank you for standing by me all these years.
translation.es: Gracias a ti por apoyarme todos estos años.

translation.en: We stood by each other.
Mm. Sarah...  If not for you,
translation.es: Sarah, si no fuera por ti,

translation.en: I wouldn't have accomplished half the things in my life.
translation.es: no habría logrado ni la mitad de las cosas en mi vida.

translation.en: You want me to cry and ruin my makeup?  Please! Please!
translation.es: - Si lloro arruinaré mi maquillaje. - ¡Por favor!

translation.en: Just don't abandon me because you're married.
translation.es: No me abandones cuando estés casada.

translation.en: Eh! God forbid! Good.
My goodness, you're so beautiful.
Look how beautiful you are. You're also beautiful. Small.
translation.es: - Mira lo hermosa que estás. - Tú también.

translation.en: Girl, you're not serious, I swear.
Is it done?
Yes, my love.
Soon, you'll be king.
Yes.
And I will be your queen.
Yes.
This is madness. What happened?
It's Kenny. He won't stop calling me. I swear, he's called, like, 12 times.
translation.es: Es Kenny. No deja de llamarme. Ha llamado como 12 veces.

translation.en: For goodness' sake, not today! Block his number.
translation.es: ¡Por el amor de Dios, hoy no! Bloquea su número.

translation.en: I've tried. He keeps calling me with different numbers.
translation.es: Lo intenté. Me llama desde números diferentes.

translation.en: - Hey, babe. -
Baby.
- You're here already. - Yeah.
- How was the meeting? - It was good. Pretty good.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo estuvo la reunión? - Bien. Muy bien.

translation.en: - Kemi. - Hi, Kola.
I thought we spoke about this dress.
I… I tried the other one, but, I don't know, I just felt like this one was better.
translation.es: Me probé el otro, pero no sé, este me pareció mejor.

translation.en: I don't think so.
Come on, Kola, this dress is perfect.
translation.es: Vamos, Kola, este vestido es perfecto.

translation.en: The groom is in the house!
Now, I have just 727 things to worry about.
translation.es: Ahora solo tengo 727 cosas de las que preocuparme.

translation.en: My man, but you know that's why I chose the best man for my best man?
translation.es: Ahora sabes por qué elegí al mejor para que sea mi padrino.

translation.en: Yeah, let's just hope he lives up to that expectation.
translation.es: Sí, esperemos que cumpla con esa expectativa.

translation.en: Yeah, and now I have to borrow the best woman to go sort out some schedules, hmm?
translation.es: Sí, ahora debo llevarme a la madrina para organizar el cronograma.

translation.en: Change the dress.
Good afternoon, sir.
Room reservation under Okafor.
translation.es: Tengo una reserva a nombre de Okafor.

translation.en: Are you here for the wedding?
Business trip.
Hey! Daddy, look at how wonderful this place is.
This place is beautiful.
Yes. It is nice.
- Nice? - Mm.  Am I the only one seeing this?
It is beautiful.
My dear, this hotel is very fine.
translation.es: Querida, este hotel es muy bonito.

translation.en: - - Oh, thank you. Welcome. Good afternoon.
translation.es: Gracias. Bienvenidos, buenas tardes. ¿Vinieron a la boda?

translation.en: - Are you here for the wedding? - Ah- ah, it's our ceremony.
translation.es: Gracias. Bienvenidos, buenas tardes. ¿Vinieron a la boda? Es nuestra ceremonia. Somos los padres de la novia.

translation.en: - We're the parents of the bride. - Oh!
translation.es: Es nuestra ceremonia. Somos los padres de la novia.

translation.en: - The one they are carrying. - Oh, wonderful.
- That's my daughter. - Welcome, Mr. and Mrs. Duru.
translation.es: Esa es mi hija. Bienvenidos, señor y señora Duru. Les daré su llave.

translation.en: Let me get you your room key.
translation.es: Bienvenidos, señor y señora Duru. Les daré su llave.

translation.en: See, all I am saying is that,
translation.es: Oye. Solo digo que en la cultura igbo,

translation.en: in the Igbo tradition, this engagement will happen in the…
translation.es: Oye. Solo digo que en la cultura igbo, este compromiso sería…

translation.en: Ifeanyi, who prefers salt to sugar?
translation.es: Ifeanyi, ¿quién prefiere la sal al azúcar?

translation.en: How would we have been able to afford this place?
For the ceremony, in our village?
Focus, please.
Well, here you go. We have you in one of our larger suites.
translation.es: Aquí tienen. Es una de las habitaciones más grandes.

translation.en: Did you hear that? Larger suites!  It's not just a room!
translation.es: ¿Escuchaste? ¡De las más grandes! ¡No es solo una habitación!

translation.en: - Thank you, my dear. - Yes, uh, enjoy the wedding.
translation.es: - Gracias, querida. - Que disfruten la boda.

translation.en: We will!
Mommy, FJ wants to come show you his outfit.
translation.es: Mami, F. J. quiere mostrarte su atuendo.

translation.en: The bottom button is undone.
translation.es: El botón de abajo está desabrochado.

translation.en: Hey, there he is! - - The man of the hour.
translation.es: Ahí está. El hombre del momento.

translation.en: Did you catapult us into a prosperous future?
Let's just say, I'll be astonished if they give it to any of our competitors.
translation.es: Diré que me sorprendería si se lo dieran a la competencia.

translation.en: - The pitch was perfect. - That's brilliant, my son.
translation.es: - El discurso fue perfecto. - Excelente, hijo mío.

translation.en: Hey, FJ my man! Looking sharp, hmm?
- Hope you guys are fine? - Oh yeah, we're good, we're good.
- - You changed your dress? Mm, that other one was a bit tight.
translation.es: - ¿Te cambiaste el vestido? - El otro era algo apretado.

translation.en: - Sarah! - If he makes you…
She knows me. Look at her… Sarah, I need to talk to you.
translation.es: Ella me conoce. Sarah, debo hablarte.

translation.en: Sarah? Just let me talk to her. I need to talk to you, Sarah.
translation.es: ¿Sarah? Déjenme hablar con ella. Necesito hablarte.

translation.en: It's-- I know him. It's okay. I know him.
translation.es: Lo conozco. Está bien, lo conozco.

translation.en: - Sarah, don't do this. - What is this?
I love you. You can't be here.
I'm telling you, you're marrying this guy for the wrong reasons, you know it.
translation.es: Te casarás con este tipo por… - Siempre consigues lo que quieres, ¿no? - Sí.

translation.en: Listen to me, you need to leave now.
translation.es: - Siempre consigues lo que quieres, ¿no? - Sí. Te está yendo bien. Estupendo. Así que…

translation.en: - So… - Yeah.
translation.es: Te está yendo bien. Estupendo. Así que… Sí.

translation.en: - I love you. Even in his wildest dreams-- - Look at me, I'll call you.
translation.es: - Nunca amé tanto a nadie… - Mírame, te llamaré.

translation.en: I don't believe this.
- I'm going to tear that bastard to shreds. - Hey. Listen--
translation.es: Quiero destrozar a ese idiota. No te metas.

translation.en: Can you imagine the disrespect?
I'll handle it, okay? Just stay out of it.
translation.es: Yo me encargo, ¿sí? No te metas.

translation.en: - If you love me-- - Come with me--
- Hey, get out of here. Now! - Sarah… Sarah, tell him.
translation.es: - Lárgate de aquí. Ahora. - Sarah, dile.

translation.en: Sarah, don't let them do this. Sarah-- Sarah, you're making a mistake.
translation.es: Sarah, no dejes que hagan esto. ¡Estás cometiendo un error!

translation.en: Sarah, I love you. Don't let them do this, Sarah. - Sir-- - I--
translation.es: - Te amo. No dejes que hagan esto. - Salga. ¡Ahora!

translation.en: I know. I'm just trying to talk to her. Get off me now. Guys, re--
translation.es: Solo quiero hablar con ella. Suélteme.

translation.en: Sarah, don't do this. Sarah, you're making a mistake. Sarah!
translation.es: ¡Sarah, no hagas esto! ¡Estás cometiendo un error! ¡Sarah!

translation.en: Do not embarrass me this day.
You hear me, my girl? I'm so sorry, Mommy.
translation.es: - ¿Me oyes, mi niña? - Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: I promise, I won't.
What was he doing here?
- Kola-- - I said, what was he doing here?
I don't know.
I swear.
Have you been in contact with him?
Has he been calling you?
Sarah.
Don't lie to me.
Are you lying to me?
He called a few times.
We just want to thank the Ademola family,
translation.es: Queremos agradecerle a la familia Ademola,

translation.en: especially Kola and Uduak, his mother, for hosting this magnificent engagement.
translation.es: sobre todo a Kola y a Uduak, su madre, por organizar este magnífico compromiso,

translation.en: You know, in this very, very fancy hotel.
I think it is right
and it is only fitting that, uh, at this point,
translation.es: Creo que corresponde recordar al gran hombre, Oladayo Ademola,

translation.en: we remember the great man himself, Oladayo Ademola, husband to Uduak,
translation.es: recordar al gran hombre, Oladayo Ademola, esposo de Uduak y padre de Kola, de Femi y de…

translation.en: and, uh, father to Kola, to, uh, Femi and to…
translation.es: esposo de Uduak y padre de Kola, de Femi y de…

translation.en: - Timeyin. - And to Timeyin. Yeah.
We all know how proud he would have been to see his youngest son, uh, tie the knot.
translation.es: Sabemos que habría estado orgulloso de ver casarse a su hijo menor.

translation.en: Will he just shut up? Mama.
But… No!
All my life, I have always played the lottery.
translation.es: Toda mi vida he jugado a la lotería.

translation.en: Every week, the same number. Every week, the same number.
But if you ask me, eh, how much have I won?
translation.es: Pero si me preguntan cuánto he ganado,

translation.en: I will say absolutely nothing!
But, uh, today, I, uh…
I feel I am the luckiest man in the whole of Nigeria.
translation.es: siento que soy el hombre más afortunado de toda Nigeria.

translation.en: Sit down.
First, I'd like to thank you,
- Mommy and Daddy Duru… - Mm.
…for raising the most beautiful woman I have ever seen.
translation.es: por criar a la mujer más hermosa que he conocido.

translation.en: - And for allowing me marry her. - Mm.
translation.es: Y por permitirme casarme con ella.

translation.en: I've been working on a drawing of Sarah
translation.es: He estado haciendo un retrato de Sarah

translation.en: that I believe captures her beauty…
translation.es: que creo que captura su belleza…

translation.en: It's beautiful.
…her grace,
and her poise.
- Mommy and Daddy Duru… - Yeah.
…please accept this as my gift.
Thank you very much.
Thank you, Kola.
What did I miss? - Timeyin! -
- Congratulations. - You made it.
Do you really think I'd miss your wedding?
- You look good. - There you go.
Um, everyone, my daughter, Timeyin, who is studying overseas.
translation.es: Les presento a mi hija Timeyin, que estudia en el extranjero.

translation.en: Mom, everybody knows I'm in rehab.
translation.es: Mamá, todos saben que estoy en rehabilitación.

translation.en: - It's the biggest news in Lagos. -
translation.es: Es una gran noticia en Lagos. Ya basta.

translation.en: Shut up.
You all know I'm in rehab, right?
translation.es: Todos saben que estoy en rehabilitación, ¿no?

translation.en: - - Now, who do I need to fuck to get a drink around here?
translation.es: ¿Con quién debo acostarme para tomar algo?

translation.en: - Joking. -
Joking! People, relax.
I'm 22 days sober, and I intend to stay that way.
translation.es: Llevo 22 días sobria y pienso seguir así.

translation.en: - I'm so proud of you. - Thank you.
How I love this son of mine.
So I guess it's too late to talk you out of this.
translation.es: Supongo que ya es tarde para convencerte de que no lo hagas.

translation.en: Come on, Mom.
You know I have had Abasiama on the phone
translation.es: Sabes que Abasiama me llama por teléfono

translation.en: in a flood of tears every day.
translation.es: en un torrente de lágrimas todos los días.

translation.en: Abasiama is always in a flood of tears, Mom.
You two made a… wonderful couple.
You were quiet this evening.
Was I?
Just tired.
What's wrong?
Nothing. I just…
I just want to change.
How long have we known each other?
What's up?
He hit me.
Kola hit you?
Again?!
Sarah, you promised me!
You told me the last time
that if he hits you again you'll leave him.
translation.es: que si te golpeaba otra vez, lo dejarías.

translation.en: You promised me, babes.
It's Kenny. It's this whole Kenny thing.
- He made him so angry. - Stop making excuses for this animal!
translation.es: - Se enojó mucho… - Deja de justificar a este animal.

translation.en: - We have to call off this wedding. - Eh?
We're calling off this wedding.
Kemi, what are you saying? I'm getting married tomorrow.
So you're ready to get married to a man who does this to you?
translation.es: ¿Te vas a casar con un hombre que te hace esto?

translation.en: Jesus, Sarah!
Do you want to be his personal punching bag for the rest of your life?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ser su bolsa de boxeo por el resto de tu vida?

translation.en: Is that what you want?
Keep an eye on Timeyin.
There are enough things to embarrass me
without her going on one of her binges.
Uncle B.
What are you doing?
Did Mother send you to watch me?
I'm not going to drink or take drugs or…
translation.es: No beberé ni me drogaré ni…

translation.en: have sex with this bar man.
I don't understand.
Please explain to me.
Speak clearly.
I said…
I don't think I can do this thing.
translation.es: creo que no puedo hacer esto.

translation.en: What do you mean by this thing?
Get married.
To Kola.
Tell me you're joking.
He beats me.
What did you do?
He beats me.
My daughter, I'm sure it can't be that bad.
translation.es: Mi hija, seguro no es para tanto.

translation.en: What do you think would happen when your ex- boyfriend turned up?
translation.es: ¿Qué creíste que pasaría cuando apareció tu exnovio?

translation.en: Constitutionally nuisance.
Have you stopped to think how embarrassing
translation.es: ¿Has pensado lo vergonzoso que habrá sido para Kola y su familia?

translation.en: that could have been for Kola and the whole family?
translation.es: lo vergonzoso que habrá sido para Kola y su familia?

translation.en: It wasn't my fau… I didn't even know Kenny was coming.
translation.es: No fue mi culpa. Yo no sabía que vendría Kenny.

translation.en: He came to see you.
But I didn't know he was coming! Mommy, I'm telling you that Kola hurts me.
translation.es: ¡Yo no sabía que vendría! Mami, te digo que Kola me lastima.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
So you're telling me
that you want to let go?
You're willing to let go of everything…
because of one slap?
Sarah!  One slap!
God forbid.
I know this is the work of my enemies. They will not succeed.
translation.es: Sé que esto es obra de mis enemigos. No lo conseguirán.

translation.en: Do you have any idea…
the sacrifices your father and I have made…
translation.es: de los sacrificios que tu padre y yo hemos hecho

translation.en: to place you where you are today?
Look at me. Look at me.
A few years ago, did I used to look like this?
It's because of the money.
That is what money does.
translation.es: Eso es lo que hace el dinero.

translation.en: So, you think your father's business
translation.es: ¿Crees que el negocio de tu padre

translation.en: would have survived a day without the support and help
translation.es: habría sobrevivido un día sin el apoyo y la ayuda

translation.en: from this family.
So you're not the only one involved,
translation.es: Así que no eres la única involucrada.

translation.en: the only one to think about in this situation, are you?
translation.es: No debes pensar solo en ti en esta situación, ¿o sí?

translation.en: Wipe your tears.
Let your face glow as the bride to be.
translation.es: Que tu rostro brille como la futura novia.

translation.en: - Aunty, it's good to see you. - Kola.
Kola. Kola.
Hey, Abby. Hey.
Hey, Abby. Hey! You look so handsome.
Chai, let me kiss you one last time as a single man.
translation.es: Chai, déjame besarte una última vez como hombre soltero.

translation.en: Kola, are you really going to do this?
translation.es: Kola, ¿de verdad vas a hacer esto?

translation.en: Yes. I am.
Too bad for me, I guess.
Hey. I cannot be dealing with this,
translation.es: Oye, no puedo ocuparme de esto.

translation.en: not right now.
Kola, please don't do this.
translation.es: Por favor, no nos hagas esto.

translation.en: Abby, this is not appropriate.
It isn't.
Please, excuse me.
Thank you for coming.
- - What the fuck is this?
Who sent you?
Did my brother send you?
You know the guy?
What?
The guy being taken out there. Looks like you know him.
translation.es: El tipo al que se llevan. Parece que lo conoces.

translation.en: No, I don't know him.
I don't.
Femi…
Did you hire the guy to kill me?
What do you mean?
When this wedding is done…
I'm coming for you.
- Hey. - What's going on?
If anything happens to me, look to our brother.
translation.es: Si algo me pasa, sospecha de nuestro hermano.

translation.en: What do you mean, what's happened?
Doesn't matter.
Look… whatever's happened, right now, you need to forget about it.
translation.es: Debes olvidar lo que haya pasado.

translation.en: Hmm? Focus on your wedding.
Yeah. Come here.
He knows.
What?
The guy we sent to him, he caught him himself.
translation.es: Él mismo atrapó al tipo que le enviamos.

translation.en: - Hey. - Hey.
Good to have you. Madam.
How are you? Good to see you.
Welcome. Good evening, Ma.
We need to get you and the ladies underway, huh?
translation.es: Tú y las mujeres deben prepararse. De acuerdo.

translation.en: Hey.
- Sarah wants to talk to Kola. - Right now?
Yes.
The engagement is about to start.
There will be no engagement unless she speaks to him right now.
translation.es: No habrá ceremonia a menos que hable con él ahora.

translation.en: - Let's go. - Yeah.
Everything okay?
- Hi. - Hey.
You promised me. The last time this happened.
translation.es: Me lo prometiste la última vez que pasó esto.

translation.en: You said it would never happen again.
translation.es: Dijiste que no volvería a pasar.

translation.en: I was going to leave.
But you said it was never going to happen again.
translation.es: Pero dijiste que no volvería a suceder.

translation.en: I made a mistake.
And so have I.
- Sarah-- - This whole thing is a mistake.
I don't want to marry you, Kola.
- No. - I don't want to marry you.
Sarah, you cannot do this, not now.
translation.es: Sarah, no puedes hacer esto. Ahora no.

translation.en: I'm doing it.
Everyone is here. I'm done.
- The hall's packed with people we invited. - Someone will need to tell them.
translation.es: - El salón está lleno de gente. - Habrá que decirles.

translation.en: They came from all over…
If you want, I can go and tell them why this wedding is not going to hold.
translation.es: Si quieres, puedo decirles por qué la boda no se celebrará.

translation.en: Sarah, listen to me.
You will not do this.
You hear me?
You will not embarrass me, embarrass my family.
translation.es: No me avergonzarás a mí ni a mi familia.

translation.en: You will not.
I'm not marrying you, Kola.
- I'm not marrying you, Kola. - You will marry me.
translation.es: - Te casarás conmigo. - ¡No me casaré contigo!

translation.en: - You will marry me. - I'm not marrying you!
- - Oh my God.
- - You disrespect me today? - You dare? -
Kola!
Kola! Kola!
Fucking bitch!
I'm going to kill the both of you.
Kemi…
Why does he have a gun? Why does he have a gun?
- I don't know. - Why?
Kola?
Is he…
Check… Check… Check the pulse.
What do we do?
Oh…
Okay.
- Hey. - Oh.
- Hi. - Hey, Kemi.
I'm not sure you're aware,
but they're like 200 people outside waiting to see an engagement.
translation.es: pero hay 200 personas esperando ver una ceremonia.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we know, we'll be down soon.
- Huh? - Is everything okay?
Yeah, sure. Of course. Why not?
I mean, of… Yeah, there was-- there was a bit of hiccup in there, um,
translation.es: Digo, claro… Sí. Hubo un pequeño percance,

translation.en: but a bit of makeup. Great.
- - Uh, sure. Is Kola in there?
No. I mean, yes. Yeah.
He was here. Normal pre- wedding jitters,
translation.es: Estuvo aquí, los clásicos nervios preboda,

translation.en: but he's left already, just a few minutes ago.
translation.es: pero ya se fue, hace unos minutos.

translation.en: Oh, uh, I must have missed him on my way up. Yeah, sure.
translation.es: - Seguro lo crucé cuando subí. - Sí.

translation.en: Uh, that's fine. I'll go find him.
But please get Sarah down as soon as possible.
- No problem. Of course. -
- What did you say? -
I said you would be down as soon as possible.
What? Wha…
We can't. We-- Kemi, Kola is dead.
translation.es: No podemos, Kemi. Kola está muerto.

translation.en: Nobody knows that. Nobody knows where he is.
translation.es: Nadie lo sabe. Nadie sabe dónde está.

translation.en: We need to move him to the bathroom. Move.
translation.es: Debemos llevarlo al baño. A un lado. Ven, vamos.

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
Kola?
Sarah, open the door.
- That's my mother. - I know.
Here. I'll take care of it.
Sarah, open the door.
Oh shit.
- Is someone in here? - Yeah, Aunty.
- Aunty, good afternoon. - Kemi! - What is holding you girls? - Nothing.
translation.es: - Tía, buenas tardes. - Kemi, ¿por qué tardan tanto?

translation.en: People are waiting. Have you seen outside? Where is she?
translation.es: - Por nada. - La gente está esperando. ¿Dónde está?

translation.en: Now my mind is at peace. Look how beautiful my daughter is.
translation.es: Ahora mi mente está en paz. Qué hermosa es mi hija.

translation.en: My only daughter.
You are as pretty as God made you.
translation.es: Eres tan bonita como te hizo Dios.

translation.en: No, no. Don't spoil your makeup.
I've prayed to God for today.
translation.es: Le recé a Dios por hoy.

translation.en: Everything is going to be fine.
I'm very proud of you.
Outside.
Everyone is gathered.
Who are they gathered for?
Me.
Yes, you, exactly.
You look so amazing.
Let's show them.
My daughter.
They tell me that, uh, you have brought a man.
translation.es: Me dijeron que trajiste a un hombre

translation.en: - - You want to marry?
Eh?
Okay. Well…
Here, take.
Go and find him and then bring him to me.
- Eh? Okay. - Mm.
translation.es: Ve a buscarlo y tráemelo. - Bien. - De pie.

translation.en: Now stand.
- Okay.  - Thank you.
- Something is wrong. - Mm?  Looks like Kola is absent.
translation.es: Algo anda mal. Parece que Kola no está.

translation.en: - Sarah? - Huh.
What in God's name is going on?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa, por el amor de Dios?

translation.en: I can't find him anywhere.
What does this mean?
I don't know. He just vanished.
You will have to tell people.
I don't understand. Tell them what?
I don't know, Akin, but someone has to tell them something.
translation.es: No lo sé, Akin. Pero alguien tiene que decirles algo.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
I would like to…
apologize for the, um,
interruption to the schedule.
We are dealing with some unforeseen circumstances.
Uh, so, um… But please enjoy,
carry on with the lovely food and drinks available.
translation.es: Disfruten de la deliciosa comida y de la bebida.

translation.en: We'll-- We'll-- We'll recommence proceedings as soon as we can. Okay?
translation.es: Reanudaremos la ceremonia en cuanto podamos, ¿sí?

translation.en: Thank you.
This is weird.
Yeah, there's something very wrong going on.
- I am not so sure. - What?
I think at the very last moment Kola has come to his senses.
translation.es: Creo que en el último momento, Kola entró en razón.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I mean, he took a look at this whole circus.
translation.es: Digo que miró todo este circo.

translation.en: This pathetic family from the village
translation.es: Esta patética familia de la aldea con la que se estaba casando,

translation.en: that he was marrying into, and he just couldn't do it.
translation.es: Esta patética familia de la aldea con la que se estaba casando, y no pudo hacerlo.

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.es: - No sé. - No creo que sea eso.

translation.en: - Yeah, I don't think that's it. - I think that is what's happened.
translation.es: - No sé. - No creo que sea eso. Creo que eso es lo que pasó.

translation.en: - He would have told me. - Exactly.
He just took to the hills.
And even though this whole fiasco will cost me an arm and a leg,
translation.es: Y aunque todo este fiasco me costará una fortuna,

translation.en: I'd rather take the hit now
than be saddled with those
peasants for the rest of my life.
translation.es: campesinos por el resto de mi vida.

translation.en: Sarah, I do not understand.
Eh? What happened?
- Daddy, I don't know. - Ah. Where is Kola?
translation.es: - Papá, no lo sé. - ¿Dónde está Kola?

translation.en: - I don't know. - Does he not want this marriage again?
Da… How many times do I have to say I do not know?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces tengo que decir que no sé?

translation.en: Don't be rude to your father.
translation.es: No trates así a tu padre.

translation.en: What is happening?
I'm not being rude. I honestly don't know.
translation.es: No lo trato mal. En serio no sé.

translation.en: If this marriage doesn't happen…
translation.es: Si este matrimonio no se concreta,

translation.en: would it affect the loan?
Daddy…
please give me one minute to talk to Sarah alone.
translation.es: dame un minuto a solas con Sarah.

translation.en: No, because honestly, we really need that money.
- Ifi. Ifi. - Our life depends on the money.
translation.es: Ifi. - Nuestra vida depende de ese dinero. - Un minuto, por favor.

translation.en: - One minute, please. - Okay… This… Okay.
translation.es: - Nuestra vida depende de ese dinero. - Un minuto, por favor. Bien, esto… Está bien.

translation.en: You had better tell me exactly what is going on.
translation.es: Será mejor que me digas qué está pasando.

translation.en: Does this have anything to do with that nonsense you were talking about last night?
translation.es: ¿Tiene algo que ver con esa tontería de la que hablabas anoche?

translation.en: They're testing me.
If my enemies try me, they'll see me.
translation.es: Si mis enemigos me ponen a prueba, me conocerán.

translation.en: God, you will not put me to shame. No!
He ran away?
He's running from you.
The free lunch is over, people.
Our lawyers will be in touch in the morning.
translation.es: Nuestros abogados los llamarán en la mañana.

translation.en: It was self- defense. He was trying to kill me.
translation.es: Fue en defensa propia. Iba a matarme.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter. Don't you know these people?
translation.es: Eso no importa, ¿no conoces a esta gente?

translation.en: Babe, calm down.
I killed their golden son. They'll lkill me and tear me to pieces.
translation.es: Kola es su hijo de oro. Me matarán. Me harán pedazos.

translation.en: Okay, so what are we going to do?
translation.es: Kola es su hijo de oro. Me matarán. Me harán pedazos. ¿Qué hacemos? El cuerpo de Kola está en mi habitación.

translation.en: - Kola's body is right there in my room. - We need to get him out of here.
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos? El cuerpo de Kola está en mi habitación. Debemos sacarlo de aquí.

translation.en: - How? Shit! - I don't know!
What?
What?
Talk.
Fuck! What are we doing?
- Kemi, at least can we-- - Chill.
We can do this. We have to do this.
Just breathe.
All right, let's go.
- Shit.  Please, can you come to this side?
- Why? - It looks like he's staring at me.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Parece que me está mirando.

translation.en: Do you want him to be staring at me?
You're not the one that was supposed to marry this man.
translation.es: Tú no eres la que iba a casarse con este hombre.

translation.en: - You're right, it's fine. -
- We start from the head. - Oh no, Kemi. What's that?
Don't you watch those beheading videos? Start from the head, there's less bones.
translation.es: ¿No ves videos de decapitaciones? Primero la cabeza, hay menos huesos.

translation.en: Actually, I've never watched a beheading video.
translation.es: Nunca vi el video de una decapitación.

translation.en: We start from the head.
Okay, please, I need a drink.
Can you help me check the mini bar?
What's that?
It's-- It's Kola's phone.
Don't pick it up. Cut.
Okay.
We need to do this now.
Hey, uh, bro, I'm just trying to find out where the hell you are.
translation.es: Hola, hermano, solo quiero saber dónde diablos estás.

translation.en: And you'd better have a good excuse for this.
translation.es: Mejor que tengas una buena excusa.

translation.en: Guy, please, just let me know you're okay, hmm?
Oh God.
Shit. Oh no. Okay.
We're gonna need another plan.
There is no way on earth we can cut up his whole body.
translation.es: No podremos cortar todo el cuerpo.

translation.en: No way.
- What? - Carry it. Just carry it.
Sarah!
Just put it.
Are you still doing laundry at this time?
Yes, it's the guest laundry from the wedding.
translation.es: Sí, es la ropa de los invitados de la boda.

translation.en: The manager sent us.
This wedding? Wow.
Where do you think Mr. Ademola is hiding?
translation.es: ¿Dónde creen que estará el señor Ademola?

translation.en: - I don't know. - We don't know. We have to go.
translation.es: - No sé. - No sabemos. Debemos irnos.

translation.en: That man didn't want to marry, that's why he ran.
translation.es: Ese hombre no quería casarse, por eso huyó.

translation.en: If you think about it, it's the bride's fault.
translation.es: Creo que es culpa de la novia.

translation.en: The bride looks like someone who would want to control her husband.
translation.es: La novia parece alguien que querría controlar a su esposo.

translation.en: It's her fault.
No one can tell me otherwise.
translation.es: Que no me digan lo contrario.

translation.en: Hey! Sarah. Let's go. Focus.
- - What the hell are these two up to?
- - Come on.
Come on. Come on.
Damn it!
This fucking car!
- Almost there. - Okay.
- Okay, sorry. - It's okay.
Let's go. Let's dig!
